page.title: 05HOMES 1
page.content:
KITCHENS
The kitchen in 1985 has nearly everything you need to cook with. There are microwaves which can warm food up,defrost and cook.It takes about two minutes to cook a pizza and about five minutes to cook a dinner. A dishwasher is a very good thing to have in a house with a big family. It saves a lot of time washing the dishes.A fridge/freezer is also very good.It is the most important thing in the kitchen.It freezes the food to keep it for along time,.which means you can use the food when you want to. Most people have access to fridges, cookers and washing machines. Many people would find it difficult to manage a home without such modern utilities.
